question: Which space craft of NASA would make an attempt to collect samples from asteroid Bennu?
explanation:
The NASAâ€™s space craft named Osiris Rex would make an attempt to collect samples from asteroid Bennu. After circling the ancient asteroid for more than two years, the space craft would make an attempt to descent on the asteroid for sample collection.
Osiris Rex mission was launched by NASA in 2018 to explore and study the asteroid Bennu. Its goal is to collect samples from the asteroid and return back to earth. The Asteroid is located hundreds of millions of miles away from earth.
